WFC,UPDATE 1-Wells Fargo admits deception in $1.2 bln U.S. mortgage accord April 8 Wells Fargo & Co admitted to deceiving the U.S. government into insuring thousands of risky mortgages, as it formally reached a record $1.2 billion settlement of a U.S. Department of Justice lawsuit. ~Wells Fargo reaches $1.2 bln U.S. mortgage settlement April 8 Wells Fargo & Co has formally reached a $1.2 billion settlement to end a U.S. Department of Justice lawsuit accusing it of knowingly deceiving the federal government into insuring thousands of risky mortgages. ~
